data.title: American Fiction (April 24) | Spring 2024 Film Series
data.meta_description: A novelist who's fed up with offensive black tropes uses a pen name to write a book that propels him into the heart of the hypocrisy.
data.text:
A novelist who's fed up with the establishment profiting from "Black" entertainment that relies on tired and offensive tropes uses a pen name to write a book that propels him into the heart of the hypocrisy and madness he claims to disdain.

Director: Cord Jefferson

Released: 2023

Starring:

Jeffrey Wright

Tracee Ellis Ross

John Ortiz
